result.arabic_text: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ
result.translation: 92. (Mûssa) alobi: Oh Hânına!(1) Eloko nini epekisaki yo mpo opekisa bango tango omonaki bazali kobunga nzela?
result.footnotes: 1 Hânına: Bótala suratu Al-Baqarah: 248, An-Nisá: 163, Al-An’âm: 84, Al-A’râf: 122,142.
